text:
When Ada Vox sang “And I Am Telling You I’m Not Going,” she meant it. Audiences did not vote through the American Idol contestant, but judge Katy Perry made an executive decision and sent the singer immediately into the Top 10.

https://www.eonline.com/news/929545/katy-perry-on-saving-american-idol-s-ada-vox-we-still-have-a-lot-to-learn-but-we-know-talent-when-we-see-it
title: Katy Perry on Saving American Idol’s Ada Vox.

og.title: Katy Perry on Saving American Idol’s Ada Vox.
